oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Give Them Bread & Circuses & They Will Never Revolt
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Typography; Sayings;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Three color window card (green, red and gray on white) illustrating a saying by Juvenal, a Roman Poet active in the second century AD. Saying reads: Give them bread and circuses and they will never revolt.
